item.title: I'm Convinced Avengers: Doomsday Will Top Captain America: Civil War In More Ways Than One After Returning X-Men Star's Recent Comments
item.description: A recent tease from one of Avengers: Doomsday's stars has me convinced the upcoming MCU movie will top the superhero showdowns seen in Civil War.

item.title: Every Fight That Hulk Won In The MCU, Ranked
item.description: The Hulk has been in some of the most iconic battle in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, with his victories quickly becoming legendary cinematic moments.

item.title: The 2010s' Most Memorable Final Shot Was So Good, You're Probably Still Thinking About It Now
item.description: Inception's final shot has become an iconic movie moment that has also inspired countless theories over the years.
